*seensince, seentill, enrolledsince and enrolledtill* fields accept the following Valid DateTime formats : yyyy/MM/dd, yyyy-MM-dd, MM/dd/yyyy, MM-dd-yyyy, yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss.fff, yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.fff, MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss.fff, MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss.fff, yyyy/MM/ddTHH:mm:ss.fff, yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fff, MM/dd/yyyyTHH:mm:ss.fff, MM-dd-yyyyTHH:mm:ss.fff, yyyy-MM-dd HH-mm-ss-tt, yyyy-MM-ddTHH-mm-ss-tt.

parameters.name: organizationgroupid
parameters.description: Organization Group Identifier in which device details will be retrieved.

parameters.name: organizationgroup
parameters.description: Organization Group Name search parameter in which device details will be retrieved.

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: Platform filter for the device details to be retrieved.

parameters.name: customattributes
parameters.description: List of custom attribute names [separated by comma (,)] for which values should be returned.

parameters.name: serialnumber
parameters.description: Device serialnumber for which values should be returned.

parameters.name: seensince
parameters.description: SeenSince DateTime, devices registered after the seensince datetime will be returned if present.

parameters.name: seentill
parameters.description: SeenTill DateTime, devices registered till the seentill datetime will be returned if present.

parameters.name: enrolledsince
parameters.description: EnrolledSince DateTime, devices enrolled after the enrolledsince datetime will be returned if present.

parameters.name: enrolledtill
parameters.description: EnrolledTill DateTime, devices enrolled till the enrolledtill datetime will be returned if present.

400.description: 1. {400 : Resource's organization group :{organizationgroupid} not found or user does not have access to this organization group.} 2. {400 : Custom Attribute Name should be a maximum of 255 characters.} 3. {400 : Platform is Invalid.} 4. {400 : SeenSince should be less than SeenTill. But, {seensince} is greater than {seentill}.} 5. {400 : EnrolledSince should be less than EnrolledTill. {enrolledsince} is greater than {enrolledtill}.}

get.summary: New - Gets the list of device wipe events for the specified organization group.
get.description: Gets the list of device wipe events for devices enrolled in the organization group.

parameters.name: organizationGroupUuid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the organization group.(Required).

parameters.name: search_text
parameters.description: The search text string which the device wipe results will be filtered by.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start of the date range which the results will be filtered by.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end of the date range which the results will be filtered by.

parameters.name: wipe_type
parameters.description: The wipe action type which the results will be filtered by. Supported values are DEVICE_WIPE, ENTERPRISE_WIPE.

parameters.name: wipe_source
parameters.description: The source of the wipe action by which the results will be filtered. Supported values are UNKNOWN, OTHER, DEVICE_DENYLIST_ACTION, COMPLIANCE, USER_DISABLED, ADMIN_ACTION, ADMIN_BULK_ACTION, SELF_SERVICE_PORTAL, DEVICE_SYNC, SMART_GROUP_EDIT, BULK_API_ACTION, DEVICE_UNENROLLMENT_REQUESTED, ADMIN_ACTION_DELETE_DEVICE, ADMIN_BULK_ACTION_DELETE_DEVICE, BULK_ADMIN_API_ACTION_DELETE_DEVICE, SINGLE_ADMIN_API_ACTION_DELETE_DEVICE.

parameters.name: wipe_status
parameters.description: The status of the wipe action by which the results will be filtered. Supported values are APPROVED, HELD, QUEUED, ABORTED.

parameters.name: ownership
parameters.description: The comma seperated device ownership types by which the results will be filtered. Supported values are UNKNOWN, CORPORATE_DEDICATED, EMPLOYEE_OWNED, CORPORATE_SHARED.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number being requested.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The maximum records per page. Default 50, Maximum page size is 500.

parameters.name: sort_column
parameters.description: The name of the column the results should be ordered by. Supported values are DATE, DEVICE_FRIENDLY_NAME, USER, ORGANIZATION_GROUP. Default is DATE

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: The sort order by direction. Supported values are ASC, DESC. Default ASC.

404.description: Not Found   1. {6008 : Organization group Uuid - {organization-group-uuid} is not found.}

422.description: Unprocessible entity   1. {1012 : Start date can not be greater than end date.}   2. {1012 : Invalid start date.}   3. {1012 : Invalid end date.}   4. {1012 : Invalid wipe type.}   5. {1012 : Invalid wipe source.}   6. {1012 : Invalid wipe status.}   7. {1012 : Invalid ownership type.}   8. {1012 : Page number should be non negative.}   9. {1012 : Invalid page size value specified. Expected between {min} and {max}}   11. {1012 : Invalid sort column.}   12. {1012 : Invalid sort direction.}
